alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 7:21PM EST until January 26 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Jackson and Barrow Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Middle Oconee River near Arcade. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands...fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage at Georgia Highway 82. A few dirt access roads will be flooded. A residential yard just downstream will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 9.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river will rise to flood stage tomorrow morning. It will then fall to 11.2 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will rise to 13.7 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 16 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 730 AM EST.
